meta.name: codex-monitor
meta.title: Codex Monitor
meta.description: Monitors codebase changes and alerts on risky diffs.

original_definition.skill_description: Monitors codebase changes and alerts on risky diffs.

actions.name: Collect Code Diffs
actions.description: Read recent commit diffs from the repository.

actions.name: Evaluate Diff Risk
actions.description: Score diff risk based on size and sensitive file changes.

actions.name: Send Risk Alert
actions.description: Notify stakeholders when risky changes are detected.

rules.name: Check Diff Size Threshold
rules.condition_expression: Changed lines exceed configured risk threshold

directives.name: Risk Alert Issued
directives.description: Risky code changes are analyzed and alerts delivered.

directives.name: Limit False Positives
directives.description: Alerting should balance signal with noise to avoid alert fatigue.
